title: Continental LTD yellow Terra Trail gravel tires celebrate 150yrs on an OPEN U.P.
content:
Continental has been making tires in Germany for 150 years, and to celebrate they produced a limited edition run of special yellow Terra Trail gravel tires. The trick though, the tires seem to be so limited that the only way you can get them is if you buy a bike.Â Continental partnered with OPEN for the

The post Continental LTD yellow Terra Trail gravel tires celebrate 150yrs on an OPEN U.P. appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
